00014 #ifndef ULIB_LOG_H
00015 #define ULIB_LOG_H 1

00017 #include <ulib/file.h>

00020 class ULog;
00021 
00022 typedef void (*vPFpf)(const ULog*);
00023 
00024 class U_EXPORT ULog : public UFile {
00025 public:
00026 
00027         typedef struct log_data {
00028                 char* file_ptr;
00029                 char* file_page;
00030         } log_data;
00031 
00032         static ULog* pthis;
00033         static ULock* lock;
00034         static bool     bsyslog;
00035         static log_data* ptr;
00036         static const char* fmt;
00037         static char* file_limit;
00038         static const char* prefix;
00039         static vPF backup_log_function;
00040 
00041         // COSTRUTTORI
00042 
00043         ULog()
00044                 {
00045                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, ULog, "", 0)
00046 
00047                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(ptr,0)
00048                 }
00049 
00050         ULog(const UString& path, uint32_t size = 1024 * 1024) : UFile(path)
00051                 {
00052                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, ULog, "%.*S,%u", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(path), size)
00053 
00054                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(ptr,0)
00055 
00056                 (void) ULog::open(size);
00057                 }
00058 
00059         ~ULog();
00060 
00061         // VARIE
00062 
00063         bool open(const UString& path, uint32_t size = 1024 * 1024, mode_t mode = 0664) { UFile::setPath(path); return ULog::open(size, mode); }
00064 
00065         static void init();
00066         static void close();
00067         static void reopen();
00068         static bool isSysLog() { return bsyslog; }
00069 
00070         // manage shared log
00071 
00072         static void setShared();
00073 
00074         // set log mode
00075 
00076         static void setClient()
00077                 {
00078                 U_TRACE(0, "ULog::setClient()")
00079 
00080                 prefix = "%4D> ";
00081 
00082                 init();
00083                 }
00084 
00085         static void setServer(bool shared)
00086                 {
00087                 U_TRACE(0, "ULog::setServer(%b)", shared)
00088 
00089                 if (shared) setShared();
00090 
00091                 prefix = "(pid %P) %4D> ";
00092 
00093                 init();
00094                 }
00095 
00096         static bool isShared()
00097                 {
00098                 U_TRACE(0, "ULog::isShared()")
00099 
00100                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(pthis)
00101 
00102                 bool result = pthis->lock->isShared();
00103 
00104                 U_RETURN(result);
00105                 }
00106 
00107         static bool isMemoryMapped()
00108                 {
00109                 U_TRACE(0, "ULog::isMemoryMapped()")
00110 
00111                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(pthis)
00112 
00113                 bool result = (file_limit != 0);
00114 
00115                 U_RETURN(result);
00116                 }
00117 
00118         // write with prefix
00119 
00120         static void log(const char* format, ...);           // (buffer write == 4096)
00121 
00122         // write direct without prefix
00123 
00124         static void write(const char* format, ...);         // (buffer write == 4096)
00125         static void write(const struct iovec* iov, int n);
00126 
00127         // flushes changes made to memory mapped log file back to disk
00128 
00129         static void msync();
00130 
00131 #ifdef DEBUG
00132         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00133 #endif
00134 
00135 protected:
00136         bool open(uint32_t size, mode_t mode = 0664);
00137 
00138 #ifdef HAVE_LIBZ
00139         static void backup(); // if overwrite log file compress it with gzip...
00140 
00141         static RETSIGTYPE handlerSIGUSR1(int signo) // manage signal SIGUSR1
00142                 {
00143                 U_TRACE(0, "ULog::handlerSIGUSR1(%d)", signo)
00144 
00145                 backup();
00146                 }
00147 #endif
